# getenv

Package getenv provides functionality for loading environment variables and parse them into go builtin types.

## Types supported:

- string
- []string
- int
- []int
- int64
- []int64
- uint64
- []uint64
- float64
- []float64
- time.Time
- time.Duration
- bool
